cause.description:
Around the world hundreds of beaches are beautiful, many are romantic, or tropical some are even considered hidden treasures. Across the street from these beautiful beaches is usually where the garbage ends up. On this side of the beach most animals gather avoiding larger predators "us".
People can get lazy, even ignorant, leaving trash behind every day. Who cleans up the beach you might ask? Some beaches have their own clean up crews but others don’t. It is up to you to keep your beach clean.
Watching a seagull chocking on a cigarette lighter had put (me) over the edge.
Please join this group to show people that you care to make a difference.
Weather you donate or tell your friends please invite more people to show you care.
1. Stop Pollution
2. Prevent animal cruelty
3. Show we care
cause.mission:
Clean beaches in the US
(invite your friends to help this organization grow)
cause.name: SAVE OUR BEACHES (stop pollution)
